book.synopsis: Pierre and Eve, soulmates who never met while alive, must come to grips with their deaths and the afterlife, and when they get a second chance and are revived, they have twenty-four hours to fall completely in love with one another.
book.title_long: Les Jeux Sont Faits (Fiction, Poetry & Drama) (French Edition)
book.dimensions: Height: 7 Inches, Length: 4.25 Inches, Weight: 0.25 Pounds, Width: 0.5 Inches
